publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1135 Tommy Sheridan: Unison Strike-That the Parliament expresses its concern that Unison members in Scottish local authorities have had to resort to strike action to secure their pay rise and calls upon the Scottish Executive to fund local authorities adequately so that they can settle this justified pay claim.

S1M-1135 Tommy Sheridan: Unison Strike-That the Parliament expresses its concern that Unison members in Scottish local authorities have had to resort to strike action to secure their pay rise and calls upon the Scottish Executive to fund local authorities adequately so that they can settle this justified pay claim.
S1M-1135 Unison Strike (lodged on 30 August 2000) Dorothy-Grace Elder*
S1M-1135 Unison Strike (lodged on 30 August 2000) Richard Lochhead*

S1M-1135 Tommy Sheridan: Unison Strike-That the Parliament expresses its concern that Unison members in Scottish local authorities have had to resort to strike action to secure their pay rise and calls upon the Scottish Executive to fund local authorities adequately so that they can settle this justified pay claim. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder, Richard Lochhead, Robin Harper*
S1M-1135 Unison Strike (lodged on 30 August 2000) Michael Matheson*
S1M-1135 Unison Strike (lodged on 30 August 2000) Christine Grahame*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Michael Russell*
S1M-1135 Unison Strike (lodged on 30 August 2000) Linda Fabiani*

S1M-1135 Tommy Sheridan: Unison Strike-That the Parliament expresses its concern that Unison members in Scottish local authorities have had to resort to strike action to secure their pay rise and calls upon the Scottish Executive to fund local authorities adequately so that they can settle this justified pay claim. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder, Richard Lochhead, Robin Harper, Michael Matheson, Christine Grahame, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Michael Russell, Linda Fabiani, Ms Margo MacDonald*
S1M-1135 Unison Strike (lodged on 30 August 2000) Andrew Wilson*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-1135 Unison Strike (lodged on 30 August 2000) Fiona Hyslop*

S1M-1135 Tommy Sheridan: Unison Strike—That the Parliament expresses its concern that Unison members in Scottish local authorities have had to resort to strike action to secure their pay rise and calls upon the Scottish Executive to fund local authorities adequately so that they can settle this justified pay claim. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder, Richard Lochhead, Robin Harper, Michael Matheson, Christine Grahame, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Michael Russell, Linda Fabiani, Ms Margo MacDonald, Andrew Wilson, Ms Sandra White, Fiona Hyslop

S1M-1135 Tommy Sheridan: Unison Strike—That the Parliament expresses its concern that Unison members in Scottish local authorities have had to resort to strike action to secure their pay rise and calls upon the Scottish Executive to fund local authorities adequately so that they can settle this justified pay claim. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder, Richard Lochhead, Robin Harper, Michael Matheson, Christine Grahame, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Michael Russell, Linda Fabiani, Ms Margo MacDonald, Andrew Wilson, Ms Sandra White, Fiona Hyslop
S1M-1135 Unison Strike (lodged on 30 August 2000) Mr Kenneth Gibson*

S1M-1135 Tommy Sheridan: Unison Strike—That the Parliament expresses its concern that Unison members in Scottish local authorities have had to resort to strike action to secure their pay rise and calls upon the Scottish Executive to fund local authorities adequately so that they can settle this justified pay claim. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder, Richard Lochhead, Robin Harper, Michael Matheson, Christine Grahame, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Michael Russell, Linda Fabiani, Ms Margo MacDonald, Andrew Wilson, Ms Sandra White, Fiona Hyslop, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Fiona McLeod*

S1M-1135 Tommy Sheridan: Unison Strike—That the Parliament expresses its concern that Unison members in Scottish local authorities have had to resort to strike action to secure their pay rise and calls upon the Scottish Executive to fund local authorities adequately so that they can settle this justified pay claim. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder, Richard Lochhead, Robin Harper, Michael Matheson, Christine Grahame, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Michael Russell, Linda Fabiani, Ms Margo MacDonald, Andrew Wilson, Ms Sandra White, Fiona Hyslop, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Fiona McLeod
S1M-1135 Unison Strike (lodged on 30 August 2000) Mr Kenny MacAskill*

S1M-1135 Tommy Sheridan: Unison Strike—That the Parliament expresses its concern that Unison members in Scottish local authorities have had to resort to strike action to secure their pay rise and calls upon the Scottish Executive to fund local authorities adequately so that they can settle this justified pay claim. Supported by: Dorothy-Grace Elder, Richard Lochhead, Robin Harper, Michael Matheson, Christine Grahame, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Michael Russell, Linda Fabiani, Ms Margo MacDonald, Andrew Wilson, Ms Sandra White, Fiona Hyslop, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Fiona McLeod, Mr Kenny MacAskill
